name: Castle of the Winds II: Lifthransir's Bane
description:
Over 100 evil monsters stand between you and destiny!

Your godparents have been murdered, and you are out to seek revenge and reclaim your birthright. To do this, you must defeat Surtur and recover the stolen Helm of Storms from his possession.

To begin, create your own character, determining sex, strength, intelligence and dexterity. Then, collect your weapons and head out for your journey. Keep your eyes open along the way. You will discover magical potions and maps that will bring you great relief... and you will need every bit of armor possible to complete the task. After all, you must struggle through twenty-five treacherous levels in the Case of the Winds. Do battle with one repulsive monster after another -- each more dangerous than the last. Just when you think it is safe, poof! A deadly trap! Do not give up. Your family name... and your happiness... is at stake.

With fantasy-like role-playing, stunning graphics and a thrilling soundtrack, Castle of the Winds 2 will keep you on the edge of your seat!
